title: League keeps dcing me randomly
body: I recently got a new router because the old one was really crappy. On wifi, the games i play, SOMETIMES it randomly dc's me and takes like...10-15 seconds to reconnect me, and this has been consistent since i got the new router. This also happens to me on Heros of the storm, accept i have to literally log out of the game, then log back in to get my connection back. Is there anything I can do to make this stop happening? I refuse to do ranked with this situation happening.

replies.body: The issue could be coming from your router or some settings since swapping for the new one.  To start, see if a [power cycle](https://kb.netgear.com/19755/How-to-Power-Cycle-Your-Home-Network?cid=wmt_netgear_organic) can help but test it in a custom game.  Your wifi could be getting in the way too, if at all possible a wired connection would be the best way to rule that out.
I am having the exact same issue as he is having also got a new router a few days ago and ever since i keep getting these short bursts of dc's would be really curious to see if he has comcast too.
